head,
body,
:root {
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: var(--system-font);
}

html {
  height: 100vh;
  overflow-y: scroll;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  line-height: 1.5;
  text-size-adjust: 100%;
  font-family: system-ui, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  text-rendering: optimizelegibility;
  /* touch-action: manipulation; */
}

a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
a.expand {
  transition: transform 0.1s linear;
}

a.expand:hover {
  /* text-decoration: underline; */
  transform: scale(1.06, 1.06);
  transform-origin: center;
}

.mono {
  font-family: var(--monospace-font) !important;
}

.Navigation ul {
  white-space: nowrap;
  display: flex;
  gap: 2rem;
  list-style: none;
}

  /* color: #fbf0df; */

  display: block;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

  margin-left: 2.4rem;
}

#HeaderInstallButton:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  transform: scale(1.06);
}

#HeaderInstallButton {
  transition: transform 0.1s linear;
  background: #00a6e1;
  padding: 8px 16px;
  border-radius: 100px;
  color: black;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.BarGraph-subheading {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgb(135, 134, 134);
  margin: 0;
}
.bun-bar {
  background-color: #f9f1e1;
  box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 3px #ccc6bb;
  background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: 56px 48.8px;
  background-position: 19px 46%;
}

.Tab:hover,
.Tab.active {
  border-bottom-color: var(--gray-400);
  background-color: var(--gray-800);
}

.CardContent {
  position: relative;
}
.DemphasizedLabel {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

#frameworks {
  display: flex;
}

.FrameworksGroup {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-rows: auto 40px;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.DemphasizedLabel {
  color: #7a7a7a;
  font-weight: 300;
}

.FrameworksList {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 40px);
  gap: 3.5rem;
  align-items: center;
}

#cards {
  display: grid;
}

.Tag {
  --background: rgba(31, 31, 132, 0.15);
  background-color: var(--background);
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding: 4px 4px;
  border: none;
  line-height: 1;
  color: black;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  display: inline-block;
  font-family: var(--monospace-font) !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 0px rgb(111 111 111);
}

.Tag--Command {
  --background: #111;
  font-weight: medium;
  color: rgb(163, 255, 133);
}

.Tag--Command:before {
  content: "❯" / "";
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35);
  margin-top: auto;
  margin-bottom: auto;
  margin-right: 1ch;
  margin-left: 0.5ch;
  display: inline-block;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.Tag--WebAPI {
  --background: #29b6f6;
}

.Tag--NodeJS {
  --background: rgb(130, 172, 108);
}

.Tag--TypeScript {
  --background: rgb(69, 119, 192);
  color: white;
}

.Tag--React {
  color: rgb(130, 216, 247);
  --background: #333;
}

.Tag--React:before {
  color: rgba(130, 216, 247, 0.5);
  content: "<" / "";
}

.Tag--React:after {
  color: rgba(130, 216, 247, 0.5);
  content: ">" / "";
}

.Tag--Bun {
  --background: #e600e5;
  color: white;
}

  }

  main {

    grid-template-rows: auto auto auto;
  }

  ul {
    padding: 0;
    list-style: none;
  }

  #logo-text,
  #HeaderInstallButton {
    display: none;
  }
}

.Zig {
  transform: translateY(15%);
  display: inline;
  vertical-align: baseline;
}

.CodeBlock {
  margin-top: 0px;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
  padding: 10px 0px;
  background-color: var(--gray-800);
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  -ms-overflow-style: none; /* Internet Explorer 10+ */
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
}
.CodeBlock::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none; /* Safari and Chrome */
}

.CodeBlock > * {
  width: fit-content;
  min-width: 100%;
}
.CodeBlock .line {
  height: 15px;
  white-space: pre;
}

.CodeBlockShell .shiki code .line:last-child::before {
  content: "$ " !important;
  color: white;
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.CodeBlockPowershell .shiki code .line:last-child::before {
  content: "> " !important;
  color: white;
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.CodeBlockResults .shiki * {
  opacity: 0.8;
}
.CodeBlockDiff .shiki code .line::before {
  content: " " !important;
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.CodeBlock > div {
  /* border-bottom: 1px solid #525567; */
  overflow: hidden;
}

.CodeBlock > div:first-child {
  border-top-left-radius: 5px;
  border-top-right-radius: 5px;
}
.CodeBlock > div:last-child {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
  border-bottom: none;
}
.CodeBlock .shiki {
  /* line-height: 20px;  !important; */
  line-height: 20px;
  padding: 3px 2.5rem 3px 1rem;
  border-radius: 0px;
  font-family: var(--monospace-font);
  margin-top: 0px;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
}
.CodeBlock .CopyIcon {
  top: -1px;
}
.CodeBlock + .CodeBlock {
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.CodeBlock code {
  font-size: inherit;
}
@media (max-width: 640px) {
  /* .CodeBlock code { */

}

.CodeBlockTab {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: center;

.PlusLine::before,
.MinusLine::before {
  color: #ffffff;
  opacity: 0.5;
  left: 8px;
  top: -6px;
  position: relative;
  font-size: 13px;
}

  content: "+";

  content: "-";

}

.Identifier {
  font-family: var(--monospace-font);
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: #50fa7b !important;
  background-color: var(--gray-800);

.PerformanceClaim {

  .sm-full {

.Tag--Command {

img {
  object-fit: contain;
}

.visually-hidden {
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  clip-path: inset(50%);
  height: 1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: absolute;
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 1px;
}

.prose > * {
  --tw-prose-body: red !important;
}
/* .prose p { */
/* color: var(--gray-800); */
/* } */
.prose :where(a):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)) {
  font-weight: unset !important;
}

.prose hr {
  margin-top: 2em;
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}
.prose code {
  background-color: var(--gray-200);
  border: 1px solid var(--gray-300);
  padding: 2px 3px;
  border-radius: 0.2em;
  font-weight: unset !important;
}
.dark .prose code {
  background-color: var(--gray-700);
  border: 1px solid var(--gray-700);
}
.prose pre {
  overflow-x: hidden !important;
}
.prose pre code,
.dark .prose pre code {
  background-color: unset;
  padding: unset;
  border-radius: unset;
  font-weight: unset;
  border: unset;
}
.prose > img {
  border-radius: 5px;
  margin: auto;
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .prose > img {
    margin-left: calc(-1 * var(--horizontal-padding));
    border-radius: 0px;
    max-width: none;
    width: 100vw;
  }
  .prose li figure {
    width: 100vw !important;
    margin-left: calc(
      -1 * (var(--horizontal-padding) + var(--list-item-padding) +
            var(--list-padding))
    ) !important;
  }

  .prose > p > img {
    border-radius: 0px;
  }
  .prose .details {
    margin-left: calc(-1 * var(--horizontal-padding));
    border-radius: 0px;
    max-width: none;
    width: 100vw;
  }
}
.prose li > * {
  margin-top: 2px !important;
  margin-bottom: 2px !important;
}
.prose li p {
  padding-bottom: 8px;
  line-height: 1.5;
}
.prose li > *:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}
/* .prose figure {
  width: 100%;
  margin: auto;
} */
.prose figure img {
  margin-top: 0px !important;
  margin-bottom: 0px !important;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}
.prose li img,
.prose li figure {
  margin: unset;
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.prose details {
  margin-top: 1.25em;
  margin-bottom: 1.25em;
  border-left: 1px solid var(--gray-300);
  padding-left: 15px;
}
.prose summary::marker {
  display: none;
}
.prose :where(code):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)):before,
.prose :where(code):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)):after {
  content: unset !important;
}
.prose :where(ul):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)) {
  list-style-type: square !important;
  padding-left: var(--list-padding) !important;
}
.prose :where(ul > li):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)) {
  padding-left: var(--list-item-padding) !important;
}
#blog-post .prose h1 {
  padding-bottom: 6px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #00000018;
}
#blog-post .prose h2 {
  padding-bottom: 3px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #00000018;
}
.prose :where(ol):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)) {
  padding-left: 1.22em !important;
}
.prose :where(ol > li):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)) {
  padding-left: var(--list-item-padding) !important;
}
.prose :where(blockquote):not(:where([class~="not-prose"] *)) {
  border-left: 1px solid var(--gray-200);
  font-weight: normal;
}
.prose a:hover {
  transform: none;
  color: var(--link-hover-color);
}
.dark .prose a {
  color: inherit;
}
.dark .prose a:hover {
  color: inherit;
}
.expand-on-hover > * {
  transition: transform 0.1s linear;
}
.expand-on-hover:hover > * {
  transform: scale(1.06, 1.06);
  transform-origin: center;
}

.prose .anchored:hover a {
  transform: none;
  color: inherit;
}
.prose h1 {
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--gray-200);
  padding-bottom: 8px;
}
.prose h2 {
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--gray-200);
  padding-bottom: 4px;
}
.dark .prose h1,
.dark .prose h2 {
  border-color: var(--gray-700);
  color: var(--gray-200);
}
.prose h5,
.prose h6 {
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* .prose img {
  border-radius: 5px;
} */
@media (max-width: 640px) {
  .prose > img {
    height: auto;
    width: 100vw;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 640px) {
  .prose img {
    border-radius: 5px;
  }
}

.callout > *:first-child {
  margin-top: 0;
}
.callout > *:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.callout > figure {
  margin-top: 1.25rem;
}
.anchored:hover a:last-child::after {

class="hidden px-4 pt-[6px] text-xs text-black sm:block"><a class="hover:no-underline" href="https://github.com/oven-sh/bun/edit/main/docs/api/file-io.md"><div class="inline-flex cursor-pointer class="h-4 whitespace-nowrap"></div><article><div class="callout dark mx-[calc(-1*var(--horizontal-padding))] my-0 border-b border-t  border-b-gray-200  border-t-gray-200 bg-gray-100 px-4 py-[13px] text-[92%] leading-6  dark:border-b-gray-900 dark:border-t-gray-900 dark:bg-gray-800 md:mx-0 md:my-5 md:rounded-[5px] md:border md:border-gray-200 md:py-[13px] dark:md:border-gray-900"><p><strong>Note</strong> — The <code>Bun.file</code> and <code>Bun.write</code> APIs documented on this page are heavily optimized and represent the recommended way to perform file-system tasks using Bun. For operations that are not yet available with <code>Bun.file</code>, such as <code>mkdir</code> or <code>readdir</code>, you can use Bun's <a href="https://bun.sh/docs/runtime/nodejs-apis#node-fs">nearly complete</a> implementation of the <a href="https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html"><code>node:fs</code></a> module.</p></div><p>Bun provides a set of optimized APIs for reading and writing files.</p><h2 level="2" anchor-id="reading-files-bun-file" id="reading-files-bun-file" class="anchored "><a name="reading-files-bun-file" class="relative top-[-80px] h-0 invisible block"></a><a href="#reading-files-bun-file" class="no-underline hover:no-underline font-bold hover:none cursor-default">Reading files (<code>Bun.file()</code>)</a></h2><p><code>Bun.file(path): BunFile</code></p><p>Create a <code>BunFile</code> instance with the <code>Bun.file(path)</code> function. A <code>BunFile</code> represents a lazily-loaded file; initializing it does not actually read the file from disk.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> foo </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">foo.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// relative to cwd</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">foo.size; </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// number of bytes</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">foo.type; </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// MIME type</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="UBYsgSkbmDki" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#UBYsgSkbmDki");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const foo = Bun.file("foo.txt"); // relative to cwd
foo.size; // number of bytes
foo.type; // MIME type`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>The reference conforms to the <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Blob"><code>Blob</code></a> interface, so the contents can be read in various formats.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> foo </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">foo.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> foo.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">text</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// contents as a string</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> foo.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">stream</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// contents as ReadableStream</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> foo.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">arrayBuffer</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// contents as ArrayBuffer</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> foo.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">bytes</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// contents as Uint8Array</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="jzLrVSBiAULw" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#jzLrVSBiAULw");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const foo = Bun.file("foo.txt");

await foo.text(); // contents as a string
await foo.stream(); // contents as ReadableStream
await foo.arrayBuffer(); // contents as ArrayBuffer
await foo.bytes(); // contents as Uint8Array`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>File references can also be created using numerical <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File_descriptor">file descriptors</a> or <code>file://</code> URLs.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #BD93F9">1234</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #FF79C6; font-weight: bold">new</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #50FA7B">URL</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">import</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">.meta.url)); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// reference to the current file</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="tXSvxEYaXPWp" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#tXSvxEYaXPWp");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`Bun.file(1234);
Bun.file(new URL(import.meta.url)); // reference to the current file`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>A <code>BunFile</code> can point to a location on disk where a file does not exist.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> notreal </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">notreal.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">notreal.size; </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// 0</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">notreal.type; </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// "text/plain;charset=utf-8"</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> exists </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> notreal.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">exists</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// false</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="jBnQkwBbivBq" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#jBnQkwBbivBq");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const notreal = Bun.file("notreal.txt");
notreal.size; // 0
notreal.type; // "text/plain;charset=utf-8"
const exists = await notreal.exists(); // false`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>The default MIME type is <code>text/plain;charset=utf-8</code>, but it can be overridden by passing a second argument to <code>Bun.file</code>.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> notreal </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">notreal.json</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">, { type</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">:</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">application/json</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> });</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">notreal.type; </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// => "application/json;charset=utf-8"</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="OmZusfOlLsSP" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#OmZusfOlLsSP");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const notreal = Bun.file("notreal.json", { type: "application/json" });
notreal.type; // => "application/json;charset=utf-8"`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>For convenience, Bun exposes <code>stdin</code>, <code>stdout</code> and <code>stderr</code> as instances of <code>BunFile</code>.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">Bun.stdin; </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// readonly</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">Bun.stdout;</span></span>

Use the <code>"path"</code> module to manipulate paths.</li><li class><code>URL</code>: A <code>file://</code> descriptor.</li><li class><code>BunFile</code>: A file reference.</li></ul><p>The second argument is the data to be written. It can be any of the following:</p><ul><li class><code>string</code></li><li class><code>Blob</code> (including <code>BunFile</code>)</li><li class><code>ArrayBuffer</code> or <code>SharedArrayBuffer</code></li><li class><code>TypedArray</code> (<code>Uint8Array</code>, et. al.)</li><li class><code>Response</code></li></ul><p>All possible permutations are handled using the fastest available system calls on the current platform.</p><div class="details group my-[1.25em] overflow-hidden rounded-[5px] border border-gray-300 bg-gray-100   text-[92%] dark:border <span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> output </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">output.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// doesn't exist yet!</span></span>

To retrieve a <code>FileSink</code> instance from a <code>BunFile</code>:</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> file </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">output.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> writer </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> file.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">writer</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="ieHtDejNgZWY" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#ieHtDejNgZWY");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const file = Bun.file("output.txt");
const writer = file.writer();`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>To incrementally write to the file, call <code>.write()</code>.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> file </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">output.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> writer </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> file.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">writer</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">writer.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">write</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">it was the best of times</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">\n</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">writer.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">write</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">it was the worst of times</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">\n</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="mQvfhKaQokqy" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#mQvfhKaQokqy");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const file = Bun.file("output.txt");

writer.write("it was the best of times\\n");
writer.write("it was the worst of times\\n");`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>These chunks will be buffered internally. <span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="TWQLeDIVWDNR" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#TWQLeDIVWDNR");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`writer.flush(); // write buffer to disk`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>The buffer will also auto-flush when the <code>FileSink</code>'s <em>high water mark</em> is reached; that is, when its internal buffer is full. This value can be configured.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> file </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> Bun.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">file</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">output.txt</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">);</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> writer </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> file.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">writer</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">({ highWaterMark</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">:</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #BD93F9">1024</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">*</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #BD93F9">1024</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> }); </span><span style="color: #6272A4">// 1MB</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="yFhlgRWqXEkO" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#yFhlgRWqXEkO");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`const file = Bun.file("output.txt");
const writer = file.writer({ highWaterMark: 1024 * 1024 }); // 1MB`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>To flush the buffer and close the file:</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">writer.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">end</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="OmACMOOYLgDR" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#OmACMOOYLgDR");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`writer.end();`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><p>Note that, by default, the <code>bun</code> process will stay alive until this <code>FileSink</code> is explicitly closed with <code>.end()</code>. To opt out of this behavior, you can "unref" the instance.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">writer.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">unref</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #6272A4">// to "re-ref" it later</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #F8F8F2">writer.</span><span style="color: #50FA7B">ref</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">();</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="pyjZcGnMyxnx" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#pyjZcGnMyxnx");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`writer.unref();

// to "re-ref" it later
writer.ref();`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><h2 level="2" anchor-id="directories" id="directories" class="anchored "><a name="directories" class="relative top-[-80px] h-0 invisible block"></a><a href="#directories" class="no-underline hover:no-underline font-bold hover:none cursor-default">Directories</a></h2><p>Bun's implementation of <code>node:fs</code> is fast, and we haven't implemented a Bun-specific API for reading directories just yet. For now, you should use <code>node:fs</code> for working with directories in Bun.</p><h3 level="3" anchor-id="reading-directories-readdir" id="reading-directories-readdir" class="anchored "><a name="reading-directories-readdir" class="relative top-[-80px] h-0 invisible block"></a><a href="#reading-directories-readdir" class="no-underline hover:no-underline font-bold hover:none cursor-default">Reading directories (readdir)</a></h3><p>To read a directory in Bun, use <code>readdir</code> from <code>node:fs</code>.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">import</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> { readdir } </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">from</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">node:fs/promises</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">;</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #6272A4">// read all the files in the current directory</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> files </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #50FA7B">readdir</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">import</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">.meta.dir);</span></span>
<span class="line"></span></code></pre></div><div id="SjOCmGryYvZr" class="CopyIcon copy absolute right-[6px] "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="clipboard h-7 w-7 cursor-pointer p-1 text-white opacity-70 hover:opacity-100 "><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 8.25V6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25-2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3.75 6v8.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 6 16.5h2.25m8.25-8.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 8.25 18v-1.5m8.25-8.25h-6a2.25 2.25 0 0 0-2.25 2.25v6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true" data-slot="icon" class="check hidden h-7 w-7 p-1 text-white "><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.916 4.626a.75.75 0 0 1 .208 1.04l-9 13.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.154.114l-6-6a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06-1.06l5.353 5.353 8.493-12.74a.75.75 0 0 1 1.04-.207Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg><script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{const clicker=document.querySelector("#SjOCmGryYvZr");clicker.addEventListener("click",(ev)=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(`import { readdir } from "node:fs/promises";

// read all the files in the current directory
const files = await readdir(import.meta.dir);`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div><h4 level="4" id="reading-directories-recursively">Reading directories recursively</h4><p>To recursively read a directory in Bun, use <code>readdir</code> with <code>recursive: true</code>.</p><div class="CodeBlock "><div class="relative  "><div><pre class="shiki" style="background-color: #282A36"><code><span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">import</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> { readdir } </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">from</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">node:fs/promises</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">;</span></span>
<span class="line"></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #6272A4">// read all the files in the current directory, recursively</span></span>
<span class="line"><span style="color: #FF79C6">const</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> files </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">=</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #FF79C6">await</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #50FA7B">readdir</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">(</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F1FA8C">../</span><span style="color: #E9F284">"</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2">, { recursive</span><span style="color: #FF79C6">:</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> </span><span style="color: #BD93F9">true</span><span style="color: #F8F8F2"> });</span></span>

  stdout: BunFile;
  stderr: BunFile;

  file(path: string | number | URL, options?: { type?: string }): BunFile;

interface BunFile {
  readonly size: number;
  readonly type: string;

  text(): Promise<string>;
  stream(): ReadableStream;
  arrayBuffer(): Promise<ArrayBuffer>;
  json(): Promise<any>;
  writer(params: { highWaterMark?: number }): FileSink;
  exists(): Promise<boolean>;
}

export interface FileSink {
  write(
    chunk: string | ArrayBufferView | ArrayBuffer | SharedArrayBuffer,
  ): number;
  flush(): number | Promise<number>;
  end(error?: Error): number | Promise<number>;
  start(options?: { highWaterMark?: number }): void;
  ref(): void;
  unref(): void;
}`).then(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.add("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.remove("hidden");setTimeout(()=>{clicker.querySelector(".clipboard").classList.remove("hidden");clicker.querySelector(".check").classList.add("hidden")},2500)})})});</script></div></div></div></article><div
